metadata.name: Suspicious Extrac32 Execution
metadata.comment: Download or Copy file with Extrac32

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('extrac32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\extrac32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('extrac32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cab')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/y')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\'))))

output.summary: Download or Copy file with Extrac32
